results.title: Senator Lummis Urges Banks to 'Embrace' Stablecoins Amid CLARITY Act Stalemate
results.description: The Wyoming Senator said stablecoins give banks an "entirely new financial product" as the crypto market structure bill faces a delay.

results.title: Bitcoin miners IREN, CleanSpark shares plunge as earnings fall short
results.description: Crypto mining stocks have declined across the board the value of the entire crypto market fell almost 9% on Thursday.

results.title: Kalshi boosts surveillance ahead of Super Bowl with independent committee
results.description: Kalshi has seen nearly $170 million in Super Bowl-related bets, and its move to boost oversight comes amid scrutiny of prediction markets by regulators and Congress.

results.title: Bitcoin Miners IREN and CleanSpark Slide After Earnings Misses Deepen Sector Pressure
results.description: Shares fell after both companies reported quarterly revenue below Wall Street expectations as Bitcoin dropped sharply.

results.title: Crypto sentiment at lowest point since 2022 crash as Bitcoin tanks to $60K
results.description: Bitcoin plummeted to a low of around $60,000 after the Crypto Fear & Greed Index hit its lowest score since mid-2022, when the Terra blockchain collapsed.

results.title: Does Bitcoin's Retreat Signal a New Bear Market for Crypto?
results.description: A single-day 14% drop and a drawdown of more than 50% have pushed Bitcoin into territory typically associated with bear markets.

results.title: BlackRock’s IBIT hits daily volume record of $10B amid Bitcoin crash
results.description: Traders were active in BlackRock’s iShares Bitcoin Trust ETF on Thursday as Bitcoin plummeted, falling 12% in the last 24 hours.

results.title: OpenAI and Anthropic Roll Out Rival AI Models as Competition for Enterprise Heats Up
results.description: OpenAI and Anthropic released new flagship AI models within hours of each other on Thursday, with benchmark results suggesting they're optimized for different strengths.

results.title: Strategy records $12.4B loss in Q4, shares dip 17% as Bitcoin tumbles
results.description: Strategy executives Phong Le and Andrew Kang say the company is on a strong financial footing despite it now being down 17.5% on its Bitcoin holdings.

results.title: Waymo’s ‘Self-Driving’ Claims Called into Question on Capitol Hill
results.description: Senators pressed Waymo over its use of human operators in the Philippines, questioning whether autonomy still means what Waymo says it does.

results.title: Crypto Treasuries Fall Deeply Underwater as Bitcoin, Ethereum and Solana Dive
results.description: Prominent publicly traded crypto treasury firms are underwater on their holdings as Bitcoin and Ethereum keep falling.

results.title: Will Bitcoin rebound to $90K by March? Here’s what BTC options say
results.description: Bitcoin fell below 63,000 as investors reacted to dismal US economic data, a weakening stock market and fears of an AI industry bubble. Does data forecast a return to $90,000 by March?

results.description: Michael Saylor called his firm a “digital fortress," but leading Bitcoin treasury Strategy has taken some serious hits in recent months.

results.title: EU tokenization companies push for DLT pilot changes amid US momentum
results.description: European tokenization companies urged EU lawmakers to quickly amend the DLT Pilot Regime, warning that current limits risk pushing onchain markets to the US.

results.title: Gemini announces exit from UK, EU, Australia, slashes workforce
results.description: Gemini, a US-based cryptocurrency exchange founded in 2015, will focus on growth in the United States due to its deep capital markets.

results.title: Bitcoin slips under $64K as record-high selling intensifies: Where is the bottom?
results.description: Bitcoin touched new lows under $64,000 as market selling reached a historic level, and analysts warn that the bottom is not in. Does data support analysts’ sub-$60,000 prediction?
